about-section.description: I am a Front End Developer dedicated for creating beautiful and functional websites. I have a strong background in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I am also familiar with the latest technologies such as React and NextJS. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow as a developer.

look-professional.title: Look Professional
look-professional.description: I build sites that look professional and are easy to navigate

are-responsive.title: Are Responsive
are-responsive.description: Sites that work with any screen size

load-fast.title: Load fast
load-fast.description: Built with full focus on performance

contact-section.title: Just say hi.
contact-section.text: Im always open to discuss your project and talk about new things.
